issue.title: [CI][Python] Run dask integration tests on Windows
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10469](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10469). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
So we can catch bugs like ARROW-10462 in advance

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10469?focusedCommentId=17262896) by Joris Van den Bossche (jorisvandenbossche):*
This won't happen for 3.0.0 (so moving milestone), but I will ensure to do a PR to ask to trigger their CI builds (including a windows build) on our nightly packages

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10469?focusedCommentId=17343179) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
Do you plan to work on this `[~jorisvandenbossche]`   ?
